doc:
Antonio Flores https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonio_Flores 0 Antonio González Flores (14 November 1961 – 30 May 1995) was a romani Spanish singer-songwriter and actor. He was the only son of singers and actors Antonio González 'El Pescaílla' and Lola Flores. He was the brother of actresses Lolita Flores and Rosario Flores. He was divorced from Ana Villa with whom he had a daughter, Alba. Antonio_González_Flores ( 14_November_1961 – 30_May_1995 ) was a_romani_Spanish_singer-songwriter_and_actor . He was the_only_son of singers_and_actors_Antonio_González_'_El_Pescaílla ' and Lola_Flores . He was the_brother of actresses_Lolita_Flores and Rosario_Flores . He was_divorced from Ana_Villa with whom he had a_daughter , Alba .
